articles.content: An employees at Sea Salt Lobster Restaurant in Saco has tested positive for hepatitis A, putting customers who ate there last month at risk of infection, according to the Maine Center for Disease Con… [+2970 chars]

articles.title: Worried about coronavirus while having sex? Wear a mask, says a new study - CNN
articles.description: To better prevent infection during sex between partners who haven't been isolating together, people should wear masks and avoid kissing, the authors write.
articles.content:
